name: Trik Prologue to revolution
description:
I did not have as much time as I would have liked to but at least it is a complete level.

Lots of polish is missing but that is life sometimes.

This is a relatively simple 2D platformer that uses physics and has some nuzzles.

Notes that should have been in game but I have stuff to do and not enough time right now:

There are 7 flowers total.

You jump with the spacebar.
